Question
========

* * is the set of even numbers and *B* of the odd numbers. Then what is the intersection of *A* and *B*?

Answerlist
----------

* A ∩ B = ∅
* A ∩ B = {0}
* A ∩ B = {even numbers}
* A ∩ B = {even numbers}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A ∩ B = ∅: Correct
* A ∩ B = {0}: Incorrect
* A ∩ B = {even numbers}: Incorrect
* A ∩ B = {even numbers}: Incorrect
